title: "Amazon will not let Police use its facial recognition software"
excerpt: "Amazon has indefinitely extended a ban on the use of its facial recognition platform by police. The civil rights activists had pressured tech companies including Amazon to stop the sale of face-recognition systems to law enforcement agencies."
